snippet.title: DISCO ELYSIUM - The Final Cut - Launch Trailer (Official)
snippet.description:
Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is now available with a -20% discount on all storefronts! Get it now.

"Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is the definitive edition of the groundbreaking role playing game. Pursue your political dreams in new vision quests, meet and question more of the city's locals, and explore a whole extra area. Also enjoy full voice-acting, controller support, and expanded language options."

Try on some of the official merch - https://shop.discoelysium.com/
Get your vinyl soundtrack - https://www.iam8bit.com/collections/disco-elysium
Pre-order the Collectors Edition here - https://www.iam8bit.com/collections/disco-elysium

Website   http://www.discoelysium.com
Twitter   https://twitter.com/studioZAUM
Instagram   https://www.instagram.com/zaumstudio
Facebook   https://www.facebook.com/zaumstudio/
